# Ignore temporary files, build files, and system-generated files
*.log
*.tmp
*.ninja_log
*.json
*.vsidx

# Ignore Unity-related cache and temporary files
Library/
Temp/
Logs/
obj/
UserSettings/

# Ignore Visual Studio-related files
.vs/
.vscode/
*.csproj
*.sln

# Ignore Plastic SCM files
.plastic/
.utmp/
